code: 'use strict';var MAX_BYTES=65536;var MAX_UINT32=4294967295;function oldBrowser(){throw new Error('Secure random number generation is not supported by this browser.\nUse Chrome, Firefox or Internet Explorer 11');}var Buffer=require('safe-buffer').Buffer;var crypto=global.crypto||global.msCrypto;if(crypto&&crypto.getRandomValues){module.exports=randomBytes;}else{module.exports=oldBrowser;}function randomBytes(size,cb){if(size>MAX_UINT32)throw new RangeError('requested too many random bytes');var bytes=Buffer.allocUnsafe(size);if(size>0){if(size>MAX_BYTES){for(var generated=0;generated<size;generated+=MAX_BYTES){crypto.getRandomValues(bytes.slice(generated,generated+MAX_BYTES));}}else{crypto.getRandomValues(bytes);}}if(typeof cb==='function'){return process.nextTick(function(){cb(null,bytes);});}return bytes;}
